name: Seireiki Rayblade
storyline: Touya Kazami was just an ordinary high school student until his teenage life was changed on Friday after-school on April 8th. Two robots where duking out at each other in the school's courtyard until one unit approaches Touya as its chosen one.
summary: Seireiki Rayblade is a Japanese tactical RPG game developed by Winkysoft as its first original title apart from the Super Robot Wars franchise, while serving as the foundation for the Masou Kishin Series for its sequels after LoE.
